Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.model.game

Class GameAssets

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am01.model.game.GameAssets
public class GameAssets extends Object
Provides predetermined lists of Objective and Card divided by type. Takes all the provided cards and objectives from relatives json files.
